testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that the web runtime is able to identify a valid application id.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that the web runtime can install the app which has a required valid version successfully.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that the WRT support Web Applications with namespace declared in configuration file.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that web application can be installed when the length of application id is 1 byte.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that web application with valid id can be installed.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check web application which the length of application id is valid can be installed.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check web application which the invalid content can be intall and launched.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that can not install the app when the required version is higher than current tizen web api version.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that the web runtime can not install the app when the required version equal to tizen web api version but not a float value (eg: required_version=2).

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that the web runtime can not install the app when the required version equal to tizen web api version but not a float value (eg: required_version=2.2.0).

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that the web runtime can not install the app when the required version is not set.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that the web runtime can not install the app when the required version is empty.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that the web runtime can install the app which has a required version equal to current Tizen Web API Version successfully.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Tizen Configuration Extensions
testcase.purpose: Check that after installing the app with a higher required version failed, the web runtime can re-install the app with valid required version successfully.
